metadata.title: Tuesday, 1st March, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    what plans the Government has to rehabilitate rural roads across the country;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to upgrade any roads in Western Province to bituminous standard; and
(c)    if so, in which Districts the roads are.

questions.minister: Minister of Energy and Water Development when the following areas in Malambo Parliamentary Constituency will be electrified
